name: MOON MOUSE
description:
A mouse goes to the moon to get cheese.

 

MOON MOUSE is a game about a mouse going on an adventure to the moon to get cheese and make money. Once you overtake company Cheese Co, things start to go downhill. Will you uncover their secrets?

HOW TO PLAY: Use WASD or arrow keys to move, when you are on the ground you can jump, when you are mid-air you can wall jump by running into a wall and holding up. When in the helicopter, use the left and right buttons to tilt and use up and down to move up and down.

Made for 10 Day Themed Jam #3

HOW IT FITS THE THEME:This game fits the theme of Ascension because it is about ascending up to the moon and the gameplay requires a lot of climbing up.

also game might be a bit glitchy
